parameters.name: FLUX
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30keV in 15 energy and 8 angle bins (as energy-pitch angle displays)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30keV at 8 pitch angles as spectrograms by energy

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA0
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30keV as a stack_plot of 15 energies at the Bin1 angle (often ~15 deg

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA1
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin2 angle (often ~35 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA2
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot  at the Bin3 angle (often ~57 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA3
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin4 angle (often ~80 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA4
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin5 angle (often ~102 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA5
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin6 angle (often ~123 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA6
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin7 angle (often ~145 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byE_atA_stackPA7
parameters.description: ---> As a stack_plot at the Bin8 angle (often ~165 deg)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30KeV at 8 select energies as spectrograms by pitch angle

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE0
parameters.description: Electron number flux 100eV-30keV as a stack_plot of 8 pitch angles at the Ch1 energy (often ~28000 eV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE2
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch3 energy (often ~13000 eV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE4
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch5 energy (often ~6100 eV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE6
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch7 energy (often ~2900 eV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE8
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch9 energy (often ~1300eV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE10
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch11 energy (often ~630 eV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE12
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch13 energy (often ~300 eV)

parameters.name: FLUX_byA_atE_stackE14
parameters.description: ---> As a stack plot at the Ch15 energy (often ~140 eV)

parameters.name: PANGLE
parameters.description: Time-varying pitch angles for 8 angular bins

parameters.name: ENERGY_filled
parameters.description: ---> Time-varying electron energies for 15 channels

parameters.name: VSW
parameters.description: SW Velocity vector (from ions and ground-based processing)

parameters.name: MAGF
parameters.description: Vector magnetic field

parameters.name: TIME
parameters.description: UNIX Time (secs since 1 Jan 1970)
